Description: Al Inma Bank (known as: Alinma) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since June 2008. It operates within the Banks sector focusing on Diversified Banks. It has companies operating across Saudi Arabia. Alinma is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in May 2008.
